hero.title: Run for Life. Camp with Purpose. Give Blood.
hero.subtitle: A national movement bringing together youth, professionals, institutions and communities at the foot of Mount Kilimanjaro to save lives, inspire responsibility, and build a culture of impact.

about.title: About the Experience
about.description: Kili Basecamp Experience is a flagship wellness, purpose and impact program hosted at the foothills of Mount Kilimanjaro — Africa's most powerful symbol of resilience. The program transforms the Kilimanjaro Marathon season into a national platform for saving lives, strengthening community responsibility, and inspiring a new generation of purpose-driven leaders.

run.title: Run for Life
run.description: Promoting health, unity and wellness through inclusive community runs.

camp.title: Camp with Purpose
camp.description: Creating space for dialogue, leadership, reflection and national responsibility.

blood.title: Give Blood
blood.description: Mobilizing real action by collecting life-saving blood for hospitals and patients in need.

fellowship.title: Youth Fellowship Program
fellowship.description: A structured leadership journey for young people who want to mobilize their communities, advocate for health and inclusion, and become national ambassadors of purpose.

csr.title: Corporate CSR Program
csr.description: A meaningful platform for organizations to engage their teams in volunteering, community contribution and credible impact.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Trusted by leading institutions across Tanzania

footer.movement: Impact Begins at the Mountain of Meaning

fellowship.intro: The Kili Basecamp Youth Fellowship is a selective leadership and impact program designed for young people who want to go beyond participation and become drivers of national change.
fellowship.intro2: Fellows are not spectators. They are mobilizers, advocates and community leaders who carry the spirit of Kili Basecamp into schools, universities, neighborhoods and institutions.
doItems: Represent Kili Basecamp in their institutions
Participate in leadership and ethics sessions
gainItems: Opportunity to be featured in media

csr.intro: Kili Basecamp offers organizations a credible, visible and meaningful platform to engage their teams in community contribution and national impact.
csr.intro2: This is not symbolic CSR. It is real action with measurable outcomes.
activityItems: Team participation in Run for Life

getInvolved.title: Get Involved
getInvolved.subtitle: There are many ways to be part of the movement. Choose how you want to contribute.

form.name: Full Name
form.type: How would you like to participate?
form.success: Thank you! Your application has been submitted successfully. We will contact you soon.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have questions or want to know more? We'd love to hear from you.

form.name: Your Name
form.subject: Subject
form.success: Thank you for reaching out! We will get back to you soon.

impactPage.title: Our Impact
impactPage.subtitle: Transparency builds trust. Impact builds credibility. This page documents the real outcomes of the Kili Basecamp movement.

mediaPage.title: Media & Stories
mediaPage.subtitle: Behind every number is a human story. Our documentary series and community stories capture the real voices, real lives and real impact of the Kili Basecamp Experience.

hero.title: Kimbia kwa Uhai. Kambi kwa Kusudi. Toa Damu.
hero.subtitle: Harakati ya kitaifa inayowaunganisha vijana, wataalamu, taasisi na jamii chini ya Mlima Kilimanjaro kuokoa maisha, kuhamasisha uwajibikaji na kujenga utamaduni wa mchango wa kweli.

about.title: Kuhusu Uzoefu
about.description: Kili Basecamp Experience ni jukwaa la kitaifa la afya, kusudi na mchango wa kijamii linalofanyika chini ya Mlima Kilimanjaro — alama kubwa ya uimara barani Afrika. Mpango huu unageuza msimu wa Kilimanjaro Marathon kuwa fursa ya kuokoa maisha, kuimarisha uwajibikaji wa jamii, na kuhamasisha kizazi kipya cha viongozi wenye kusudi.

run.title: Kimbia kwa Uhai
run.description: Kukuza afya, umoja na ustawi kupitia mbio za jamii zinazojumuisha wote.

camp.title: Kambi kwa Kusudi
camp.description: Kuunda nafasi ya mazungumzo, uongozi, tafakuri na wajibu wa kitaifa.

blood.title: Toa Damu
blood.description: Kuhamasisha hatua halisi kwa kukusanya damu inayookoa maisha kwa hospitali na wagonjwa wanaohitaji.

fellowship.title: Programu ya Ushirika wa Vijana
fellowship.description: Safari ya uongozi iliyoundwa kwa vijana wanaotaka kuhamasisha jamii zao, kutetea afya na ujumuisho, na kuwa mabalozi wa kitaifa wa kusudi.

csr.title: Programu ya CSR ya Kampuni
csr.description: Jukwaa lenye maana kwa mashirika kushirikisha timu zao katika kujitolea, mchango wa jamii na athari ya kuaminika.

partners.title: Washirika Wetu
partners.subtitle: Tunaaminiwa na taasisi zinazoongoza nchini Tanzania

fellowship.intro: Youth Fellowship Program ya Kili Basecamp ni programu maalum ya uongozi na mchango kwa vijana wanaotaka kwenda zaidi ya kushiriki — na kuwa waendesha mabadiliko ya kweli katika jamii zao.
fellowship.intro2: Washirika si watazamaji. Wao ni wahamasishaji, watetezi na viongozi wa jamii wanaobeba roho ya Kili Basecamp katika shule, vyuo vikuu, mitaa na taasisi.
doItems: Kuongoza kampeni za uhamasishaji wa utoaji damu
Kupanga vikao vya uhamasishaji wa jamii
Kuwakilisha Kili Basecamp katika taasisi zao
Kushiriki katika vikao vya uongozi na maadili
Kuchangia hadithi na ripoti za athari
applyItems: Wanafunzi, wataalamu wachanga, viongozi wa jamii
gainItems: Fursa ya kuonekana vyomboni vya habari

csr.pageTitle: Programu ya Uwajibikaji wa Kijamii wa Kampuni
csr.intro: Kili Basecamp inatoa jukwaa la kuaminika na lenye maana kwa taasisi na kampuni kushirikisha wafanyakazi wao katika mchango wa kweli kwa jamii na taifa.
csr.intro2: Hii si CSR ya ishara. Ni hatua halisi zenye matokeo yanayopimika.
csr.whyPartner: Kwa Nini Kushirikiana Kupitia Kili Basecamp
partnerItems: Kuchangia vipaumbele vya afya ya kitaifa
Kuonyesha uwajibikaji wa kijamii wa kweli
activityItems: Timu kushiriki katika Run for Life

getInvolved.title: Shiriki
getInvolved.subtitle: Kuna njia nyingi za kuwa sehemu ya harakati hii. Chagua namna unavyotaka kushiriki.

form.name: Jina Kamili
form.success: Asante! Maombi yako yamewasilishwa kwa mafanikio. Tutawasiliana nawe hivi karibuni.

contact.title: Wasiliana Nasi
contact.subtitle: Una maswali au unataka kujua zaidi? Tungependa kusikia kutoka kwako.

form.name: Jina Lako
form.subject: Mada
form.success: Asante kwa kuwasiliana! Tutakujibu hivi karibuni.

impactPage.title: Athari Yetu
impactPage.subtitle: Uwazi hujenga imani. Athari hujenga uaminifu. Ukurasa huu unaonyesha matokeo halisi ya harakati ya Kili Basecamp.

mediaPage.title: Vyombo vya Habari na Hadithi
mediaPage.subtitle: Nyuma ya kila takwimu kuna hadithi ya binadamu. Vipindi vyetu vya video na simulizi za jamii vinaonyesha sauti halisi, maisha halisi na athari halisi za Kili Basecamp.
